name: Hop and Hurl
overview: Gotta keep hopping, these lilly pads shift and sink into the pond. Avoid the crabs who are trying to get you. hopping on the pads by the grass will let you turn them into lilly pads and open up more areas, but be careful not to end up in the water. Try to make your way safely to the other side where you can dump your competitor in the drink and win!
